trans-unit.source: Defines arrays of colors and positions used for interpolating color blending in a multicolor gradient.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend"></xref> class with the specified number of colors and positions.
The number of colors and positions in this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend"></xref>.
Gets or sets an array of colors that represents the colors to use at corresponding positions along a gradient.
This property is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Color> structures that represents the colors to use at corresponding positions along a gradient.
Along with the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Positions%2A> property, this property defines a multicolor gradient.
An array of <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structures that represents the colors to use at corresponding positions along a gradient.
Gets or sets the positions along a gradient line.
The elements of this array specify percentages of distance along the gradient line.
For example, an element value of 0.2f specifies that this point is 20 percent of the total distance from the starting point.
The elements in this array are represented by float values between 0.0f and 1.0f, and the first element of the array must be 0.0f and the last element must be 1.0f.
Along with the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Colors%2A> property, this property defines a multicolor gradient.
An array of values that specify percentages of distance along the gradient line.
